ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: All we need now is a /goto start command and we ll never have to twist again!!! Elwyn  60 Virtuoso, Erollisi Marr ... From: Kimes, Dean W.
ygData.messageBody:
All we need now is a '/goto start' command and we'll never have to twist
again!!!


Elwyn <Da`Kor>
60 Virtuoso, Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 28, 2000 2:04 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message


Yikes! I'll bet that will be nerfed within minutes. Of course there will
still be no way to deal with missed notes... or will there, hmmm.

Kit

Sounds like you might be able to set up some weaving via the social keys
with this new "pause" command. It'll be fun to test!
